originalText.text: Asher truly brings the A Team energy- with her attention to detail, awesome eye, and overall magical touch she makes every shot feel effortless and fun! Highly recommend for photography, will definitely be working with her in the future! Wedding photography was a priority for us and Asher did not disappoint! Simply perfect, so talented! Asher is a wedding must on any bride’s checklist!

text.text: Asher truly brings the A Team energy- with her attention to detail, awesome eye, and overall magical touch she makes every shot feel effortless and fun! originalText.text: Asher is the best there is! My husband and I worked with Asher throughout our engagement and wedding day. Asher, from the start made us feel comfortable in front of the camera. Asher is extremely professional. She consistently kept in contact with us, was very flexible, and just an absolute joy to be around and work with. Asher exceeded my expectations from the start. I discussed with her some vibes and specific shots that I wanted on our wedding day and she did that and MORE! I cannot recommend Asher enough to everyone I know who is getting married and engaged. The final product of pictures I received from our wedding day brought tears to my eyes. I look forward to working with Asher again for future celebrations!

originalText.text:
Booking Asher was hands down one of the BEST decisions we made during our wedding planning process!!! She is organized, thorough, and super kind. I appreciate how easy she made everything during the wedding planning process by proactively sending resources, checking in, and making us feel very supported.
On the day of the wedding, she blew us away! Asher has a warm and vibrant personality that made us feel super comfortable taking photos. We LOVE the pictures and had the best experience working with Asher. I cannot recommend Asher enough!!!

text.text:

I appreciate how easy she made everything during the wedding planning process by proactively sending resources, checking in, and making us feel very supported.
On the day of the wedding, she blew us away! Asher has a warm and vibrant personality that made us feel super comfortable taking photos. We LOVE the pictures and had the best experience working with Asher. I cannot recommend Asher enough!!!

originalText.text:
Asher Gardner is the best choice you will make as part of your wedding process - or for that matter, anything that involves photography! From the second I met her, things automatically clicked. In addition to creating a beautiful custom photography proposal, she made me feel like I had known her for years already and took such a genuine interest in getting to know me and my husband. That went a long way in terms of telling our story as well. She was also extremely organized throughout the process, which took one less stress off of planning!

Both our engagement and wedding photos were so beautiful. Getting pictures taken all day can sometimes be a lot and awkward, and she just made us feel so comfortable throughout.

Book Asher and her team ASAP - I promise you won't regret it.

text.text:

In addition to creating a beautiful custom photography proposal, she made me feel like I had known her for years already and took such a genuine interest in getting to know me and my husband. That went a long way in terms of telling our story as well. She was also extremely organized throughout the process, which took one less stress off of planning!

Both our engagement and wedding photos were so beautiful. Getting pictures taken all day can sometimes be a lot and awkward, and she just made us feel so comfortable throughout.

Book Asher and her team ASAP - I promise you won't regret it.

originalText.text: Asher is an absolute dream to work with!! I had no idea just how influential the photographer is an orchestrating the big day, and I thank my lucky stars that I ended up with a photographer as professional, detail oriented, and talented as Asher. First, I just fell in love with her style. I'm obsessed with the natural light and bright and airy feel of her photos. She does an amazing job of capturing the little details of the day as well as capturing the candid "in between" moments that in my opinion, are even more beautiful than the staged photos. My husband and I were in constant communication with Asher during the wedding planning process and I found myself turning to Asher for advice and guidance on so many different aspects of the wedding such as how the flowers would photograph, how handle the sometimes complicated nuances of family photos, chatting about the timeline and our goals. She was almost like a mentor through the entire planning process which meant so much to us. By the time our big day came, my husband and I already felt like close friends with her. As a bride, you're actually spending most of your wedding day with the photographer and again, I was so grateful that Asher was as wonderful as she is because I didn't realize just how much time we'd be spending together on the wedding day. The second photographer and assistant Asher brought with her were equally as wonderful. During our first look I was STARVING and her assistant gave me the granola bar out of her purse. So sweet and thoughtful! We also had a few unexpected challenges come up - including a parade that was blocking our entrance to the first look and unpredicted rain. Asher handled these challenges with grace and was never panicked or stressed which also kept my calm. At the end of the night when it came time for her and her staff to leave, my husband and I were sad to say goodbye. Asher is absolutely the full package and you will have no regrets with your decision to work with her!
